SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Level2.EnemyLevelTwo

Class BossConfig

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level2.EnemyLevelTwo.BossConfig
public class BossConfig extends Object
Configuration class for the Boss enemy in Level 2. This class holds constant values related to the Boss's behavior, such as fire rate, shield probability, initial health, and shield duration. These constants are used throughout the Boss class to manage its mechanics.

  • Field Details

    • BOSS_FIRE_RATE

      public static final double BOSS_FIRE_RATE
      The fire rate of the Boss. Determines the probability that the Boss will fire a projectile in a given frame. Value between 0 and 1, where higher values increase the likelihood of firing.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BOSS_SHIELD_PROBABILITY

      public static final double BOSS_SHIELD_PROBABILITY
      The probability that the Boss will activate its shield during a given frame. Value between 0 and 1, where higher values increase the likelihood of shield activation.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BOSS_INITIAL_HEALTH

      public static final int BOSS_INITIAL_HEALTH
      The initial health of the Boss at the start of the level. This value represents how much damage the Boss can take before being defeated.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SHIELD

      public static final int MAX_FRAMES_WITH_SHIELD
      The maximum number of frames that the Boss's shield can stay activated. After this duration, the shield will be deactivated.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
